fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, choose any number of your effects to not have to use the next night. You may only do this once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At the beginning of each night, three players other than yourself will be given to you at random. You must choose one to roleblock, another to become Lovers with, and a third to attack.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Bed a sexy player, wed a player that'd be a good partner, and behead an annoying player. Qualifications can be based on personality, role, or whatever; the host decides what counts.
